author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10008528

Uncover a haunting fairytale in Bye Sweet Carole, releasing October 9th, 2025 on PlayStation 5.

Step into a world inspired by classic animation, where beauty and terror intertwine. Follow Lana Benton as she ventures into the eerie gardens and shadowed halls of Corolla, a realm filled with unsettling mysteries, strange inhabitants, and whispers of a vanished girl named Carole.

#ps5 #ps5games #gamescom
title: Bye Sweet Carole - Release Date Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Harlowe the Gravitar is a former Maliwan combat scientist, driven by the need to understand how things work. Nothing says "power fantasy" like wiping out waves of enemies with a combination of crowd-control abilities and area-of-effect annihilation—both of which happen to be her specialty!

Using her collection of combat-ready inventions, Harlowe can dominate any space by nuking the battlefield with Cryo and Radiation damage, or protect herself and co-op allies with enhanced shielding and more.

Borderlands 4 is now available for pre-order on PlayStation®5! 💥

#ps5 #ps5games #borderlands4

Rated Mature
title: Borderlands 4 - Harlowe Gameplay Overview | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/where-winds-meet/

Explore Where Winds Meet in stunning 4K — feel the rhythm of Wuxia with haptic feedback and adaptive triggers, and immerse yourself in the Eastern open world with 3D AUDIO.

​Where Winds Meet is an epic open-world action-adventure RPG rooted in the rich legacy of Wuxia. Set during the turbulent era of tenth-century China, you take on the role of a young sword master, uncovering forgotten truths and the mysteries of your own identity. As the wind stirs across mountains and rivers, so too will your legend rise.

Where Winds Meet will be available on November 14, 2025, for PS5. Pre-order Bundle available now:
www.playstation.com/games/where-winds-meet/

#ps5 #ps5games #gamescom
title: Where Winds Meet - Features | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:

#ps5games #ps5 #gamescom

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10015158/

From the alpine village of Valadilène to the relaxing baths of Aralbad, Syberia - Remastered will take you through an amazing journey on PlayStation 5 on November 6th!

Rediscover the clockpunk universe of Benoît Sokal in this fully remastered version of the first Syberia game. Join Kate Walker and Oscar, a strange and charming automaton, in pursuit of the brilliant inventor Hans Voralberg, and embark on an adventure more immersive and poetic than ever.

#ps5 #ps5games #syberia
title: Syberia - Remastered - Before & After Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10008447

The award-winning Satisfactory is coming to PS5 this November! Satisfactory is a first-person open-world factory building game with a dash of exploration and combat. Play alone or with friends, explore an alien planet, create multi-story factories, and enter conveyor belt heaven!

#ps5 #ps5games #gamescom
title: Satisfactory - Announcement Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/lost-soul-aside/

Meet the visionary team at Ultizero Games and uncover how Lost Soul Aside™ evolved from a solo passion project into a full-scale action RPG. Explore the creative process, challenges, and inspirations that shaped this ambitious title.

Available August 29, on PS5® console and PC (available 5pm PDT on August 28 in the US/Latin America). 

Pre-order now for in-game bonuses.

#ps5 #ps5games #PC #lostsoulaside
title: Lost Soul Aside - A Hero’s Journey (Behind The Scenes) | PS5 & PC Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/lost-soul-aside/

Lost Soul Aside™ is coming to PC on August 29 (available 5pm PDT on August 28 in the US/Latin America)! Experience the fast-paced action RPG with enhanced performance and stunning visual fidelity. Journey through breathtaking environments in optimized 4K, with fully customizable graphics settings and unlocked framerates.

Enjoy immersive ray tracing for realistic lighting and reflections, High Dynamic Range for vivid contrast and color (compatible pc, display, and graphics card required for enhanced visual features), and full support for the DualSense® controller with adaptive triggers and haptic feedback (wired connection required).

Pre-order now on Steam and the Epic Games Store.

#ps5 #ps5games #PC #pcgames #lostsoulaside
title: Lost Soul Aside - PC Features Trailer | PS5 & PC Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10008849/

Jump into adventure in Nikoderiko: The Magical World - Director's Cut, now available as a physical retail edition on PlayStation®5! Take Nikoderiko home today and embark on an unforgettable adventure inspired by classic platformers. 

Choose from the Standard Edition (game only) or Collector's Edition, which includes a colorful Art Book and Original Soundtrack composed by genre legend David Wise.

You can also play the free Demo to explore 3 levels from the full game, including locations from Skyward Falls and Snowland.

#ps5 #ps5games #Nikoderiko
title: Nikoderiko: The Magical World - Physical Release Trailer | PS5 Games
